description:
Venera and Plamja face off against the Governor of Tokyo and in the final battle for West Udogawa. Zvezda pulls out all stops to achieve world conquest.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: May the Light of Zvezda Shine Throughout This World
Que la lumière de Zvezda resplendisse sur le monde entier
Zvezda no Hikari o Amaneku Sekai ni
ズヴィズダーの光をあまねく世界に
